com.example.stanza

Class NotesProvider2

  • java.lang.Object
    • ContentProvider
      • com.example.stanza.NotesProvider2

  • public class NotesProvider2
extends ContentProvider
    This is the ContentProvider for the myFriends table in the friends database (the local database that stores who the friends of this user are.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Uri CONTENT_URI
      The complete uri to access the myFriends table in the friends database.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NotesProvider2()

      int delete(Uri uri, java.lang.String selection, java.lang.String[] selectionArgs)
      Delete friend records from the myFriends table.

      A required method for making a notesProvider, does nothing functionally.
      Uri insert(Uri uri, ContentValues values)
      Insert a friend record into the myFriends table.
      boolean onCreate()
      Initialize the instance of SQLiteDatabase with the friends database in DBOpen2.

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        public boolean onCreate()
        Initialize the instance of SQLiteDatabase with the friends database in DBOpen2.
        Returns:
        true when created.

      • query

        public Cursor query(Uri uri,
                    java.lang.String[] projection,
                    java.lang.String selection,
                    java.lang.String[] selectionArgs,
                    java.lang.String sortOrder)
        Query the myFriends table and return all friends that exist in the local database.
        Parameters:
        uri - The uri used to access the table in the database.
        projection - What columns we want returned in the query.
        selection - The selection clause.
        selectionArgs - The selection arguments.
        sortOrder - The order the query results should be returned in.
        Returns:
        A cursor containing the records that satisfy the query

      • getType

        public java.lang.String getType(Uri uri)
        A required method for making a notesProvider, does nothing functionally.
        Parameters:
        uri - identifies the table
        Returns:
        null

      • insert

        public Uri insert(Uri uri,
                  ContentValues values)
        Insert a friend record into the myFriends table.
        Parameters:
        uri - The uri to access the myFriends table.
        values - The values (friend and _id) to be inserted into the table
        Returns:
        The uri of the inserted friend.

      • delete

        public int delete(Uri uri,
                  java.lang.String selection,
                  java.lang.String[] selectionArgs)
        Delete friend records from the myFriends table.
        Parameters:
        uri - The uri to access the myFriends table
        selection - The selection clause of the query
        selectionArgs - The selection arguments of the query
        Returns:
        The number of records deleted

      • update

        public int update(Uri uri,
                  ContentValues values,
                  java.lang.String selection,
                  java.lang.String[] selectionArgs)
        Update the records within the myFriends table.
        Parameters:
        uri - The uri to access the myFriends table
        values - The values being updated in the records.
        selection - The selection clause of the query.
        selectionArgs - The selection arguments of the query
        Returns:
        the number of records updated
